headline: Is Constellation Energy’s 49.6% Surge Justified Amid Clean Energy Policy Shifts?
summary: Wondering if Constellation Energy is truly worth its current price tag? You’re not alone, as it is one of the most asked-about stocks right now. After a powerhouse run this year, Constellation’s share price is up 49.6% year-to-date and has soared 56.2% over the past year, despite some volatility in the last week. The recent price momentum has been shaped by news around national clean energy policy shifts and renewed interest from institutional investors, both fueling optimism about the...
